title: How to Make Kvass

steps.headline: Put 1.5 liters of water into a pot and bring it to a boil.
steps.description: For this recipe you will need 1.5 liters (0.4 US gal) of water. You can make more or less at a time, but make sure to scale ingredients properly.

steps.headline: Take 2 slices of rye or pumpernickel bread.
steps.description: Toast them in a toaster on maximum settings.

steps.headline: Take your water off the heat once it boils.
steps.description: Add in your toasted bread, 20 raisins and 2 slices of lemon, with peel. Put a lid on your pot and let it sit for 4 hours.

steps.headline: After 4 hours, take the lid off your pot.
steps.description: Remove the solid ingredients from your liquid. It is suggested that you run your kvass through a strainer into a separate bowl so that you have only liquid in the bowl.

steps.headline: Add 1 tsp of dry yeast into your kvass.
Add 100g of sugar into your kvass
Add 20 new raisins into your kvass.
Stir and pour into a glass jar.
steps.description: Make sure the jar has an air tight seal.

steps.headline: Seal the jar and leave it in a place that stays room temperature on average.
steps.description: Leave the kvass there for 48 hours.

steps.headline: After 48 hours, take your kvass and run it through a cheesecloth into a separate bowl.
Squeeze a lemon's worth of lemon juice into the kvass.
Pour it into another glass jar and put it in a refrigerator.
steps.description: Now your Kvass is ready for consumption.

text: Preparing the Base Liquid Put 1.5 liters of water into a pot and bring it to a boil. For this recipe you will need 1.5 liters (0.4 US gal) of water. You can make more or less at a time, but make sure to scale ingredients properly. Take 2 slices of rye or pumpernickel bread. Toast them in a toaster on maximum settings. Take your water off the heat once it boils. Add in your toasted bread, 20 raisins and 2 slices of lemon, with peel. Put a lid on your pot and let it sit for 4 hours. Adding More Ingredients After 4 hours, take the lid off your pot. Remove the solid ingredients from your liquid. It is suggested that you run your kvass through a strainer into a separate bowl so that you have only liquid in the bowl. Add 1 tsp of dry yeast into your kvass.  Add 100g of sugar into your kvass  Add 20 new raisins into your kvass.  Stir and pour into a glass jar. Make sure the jar has an air tight seal. Seal the jar and leave it in a place that stays room temperature on average. Leave the kvass there for 48 hours. Finishing Up After 48 hours, take your kvass and run it through a cheesecloth into a separate bowl.  Squeeze a lemon's worth of lemon juice into the kvass.  Pour it into another glass jar and put it in a refrigerator. Now your Kvass is ready for consumption.
